title: Criterion 1
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Selects and completely identifies another work in which a specific outdoor location was transformed.

Identifying a work of art includes title or designation, name of the artist and/or culture of origin, date of creation, and materials. At least two accurate identifiers must be given for the point to be earned. If the work appears on the list provided, two accurate identifiers NOT included on the list must be given for the point to be earned.
descriptions:
Selects and completely identifies another work in which a specific outdoor location was transformed.

Identifying a work of art includes title or designation, name of the artist and/or culture of origin, date of creation, and materials. At least two accurate identifiers must be given for the point to be earned. If the work appears on the list provided, two accurate identifiers NOT included on the list must be given for the point to be earned.

title: Criterion 2
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately describes how the specific outdoor location of The Gates was transformed.
descriptions: Accurately describes how the specific outdoor location of The Gates was transformed.

title: Criterion 3
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately describes how the specific outdoor location of the selected work was transformed.
descriptions: Accurately describes how the specific outdoor location of the selected work was transformed.

title: Criterion 4
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately uses specific visual or contextual evidence to analyze the similarities between these transformations.
descriptions: Accurately uses specific visual or contextual evidence to analyze the similarities between these transformations.

title: Criterion 5
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately uses specific visual or contextual evidence to analyze the differences between these transformations.
descriptions: Accurately uses specific visual or contextual evidence to analyze the differences between these transformations.

title: Criterion 6
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately analyzes how the transformation shaped viewers’ experience of The Gates.
descriptions: Accurately analyzes how the transformation shaped viewers’ experience of The Gates.

title: Criterion 7
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Accurately analyzes how the transformation shaped viewers’ experience of the selected work.
descriptions: Accurately analyzes how the transformation shaped viewers’ experience of the selected work.
